title: Pale Oak

Infused with Silvanus' strength, these staves are gifted to Faithwardens who act in defence of nature.

Pale Oak Information

Faithwarden's Stride: Druidic vines cannot Ensnare you and do not count as difficult terrain. Faithwarden's Vines: Vines sprout from the ground, slowing creatures within and possibly Entangling them. Range: 1.5m

Pale Oak Location & Where to Find
